description.brief: Driver for iRobot Turtlebot and Roomba

package.description:
For ROS bindings, please see turtlebot_node.
This is a generic driver for iRobot Turtlebot and Roomba. Port of pyrobot.py by Damon Kohler.
package.author: Damon Kohler. Ported and maintained by Ken Conley and Melonee Wise
